kv_audit_dropped_events.help: Number of events dropped by auditing subsystem due to issues writing to disk

kv_audit_enabled.help: Whether the auditing subsystem is enabled

kv_auth_cmds.help: Number of SASL auth requests since restart

kv_auth_errors.help: Number of SASL auth errors since restart

kv_bg_wait_seconds.help: Background fetches waiting in the dispatcher queue

kv_cmd_duration_seconds.help: Per-opcode histogram of time taken to execute operations

kv_cmd_lookup_10s_count.help: The number of lookup operations performed within the last 10 seconds

kv_cmd_lookup_10s_duration_seconds.help: The total duration of lookup operations performed over the last 10 seconds

kv_cmd_mutation_10s_count.help: The number of mutation operations performed within the last 10 seconds

kv_cmd_mutation_10s_duration_seconds.help: The total duration of mutation operations performed over the last 10 seconds

kv_cmd_total_gets.help: Global number of gets processed by all buckets, since restart

kv_cmd_total_ops.help: Global number of operations processed by all buckets, since restart

kv_cmd_total_sets.help: Global number of sets processed by all buckets, since restart

kv_collection_history.help: Whether history (CDC) is enabled for each collection

kv_collection_ops.help: Per-collection counters of sets/gets/deletes since restart

kv_conflicts_resolved.help: Counter of all SetWithMeta/DelWithMeta conflict resolution results. The result may be that the incoming operation was: accepted as it is 'ahead', rejected as it is 'behind', or rejected as it appears identical (by metadata, not comparing document bodies)

kv_conn_yields.help: Number of times a frontend connection exhausted its allowed number of events, and yielded to allow other threads to run

kv_connection_recycle_high_watermark.help: Number (or percentage of total available) connections allowed before KV will begin to close older connections to avoid reaching the limit

kv_connection_structures.help: Current number of Connection structures in memory

kv_curr_items.help: Number of active items in memory

kv_curr_temp_items.help: Number of temporary items in memory

kv_daemon_connections.help: Current number of MCBP/DCP connections from internal clients (e.g., other Couchbase services)

kv_daemon_memory_allocated_bytes.help: Current amount of memory allocated which is _not_ associated with a particular bucket

kv_daemon_memory_resident_bytes.help: Current amount of memory resident which is _not_ associated with a particular bucket

kv_datatype_count.help: Count of items in memory with a given datatype combination

kv_dcp_backoff.help: Number of times Consumer DCP connections (i.e., replica) have paused consuming items because memory usage is too high

kv_dcp_connection_count.help: Current number of DCP connections (Consumers or Producers)

kv_dcp_max_running_backfills.help: Maximum number of backfills across all DCP connections

kv_dcp_num_running_backfills.help: Total number of running backfills across all DCP connections

kv_dcp_producer_count.help: Current number of DCP Producer connections (outbound)

kv_dcp_queue_fill.help: Number of items ever queued to send across all _existing_ DCP connections

kv_dcp_ready_queue_size_bytes.help: Estimated memory usage of items waiting to be sent across all _existing_ DCP connections

kv_disk_seconds.help: waiting for a commit after a batch of updates

kv_domain_memory_used_bytes.help: Current memory used in KV for primary/secondary domain

kv_ep_access_scanner_last_runtime_second.help: Number of seconds that last Access Scanner task run took to complete.

kv_ep_access_scanner_num_items.help: Number of items that last Access Scanner task run wrote to the Access Log.

kv_ep_access_scanner_task_time.help: Time of the next access scanner task (GMT), NOT_SCHEDULED if access scanner has been disabled

kv_ep_ahead_exceptions.help: Total number of times a replica saw an item with a HLC CAS from too far in the future (indicating the active clock is ahead)

kv_ep_behind_exceptions.help: Total number of times a replica saw an item with a HLC CAS from too far in the past (indicating the active clock is behind)

kv_ep_bg_fetch_avg_read_amplification_ra.help: Average read amplification for all background fetch operations - ratio of read()s to documents fetched.

kv_ep_bg_fetched.help: Number of items fetched from disk

kv_ep_bg_load_avg_seconds.help: The average time for an item to be loaded from disk

kv_ep_bg_load_seconds.help: The total elapsed time for items to be loaded from disk

kv_ep_bg_max_load_seconds.help: The longest load time when loading from disk

kv_ep_bg_max_wait_seconds.help: The longest time in the queue waiting to be loaded from disk

kv_ep_bg_meta_fetched.help: Number of metadata fetches from disk

kv_ep_bg_min_load_seconds.help: The shortest load time when loading from disk

kv_ep_bg_min_wait_seconds.help: The shortest time in the queue waiting to be loaded from disk

kv_ep_bg_num_samples.help: The number of samples included in the average

kv_ep_bg_remaining_items.help: Number of remaining bg fetch items

kv_ep_bg_remaining_jobs.help: Number of remaining bg fetch jobs

kv_ep_bg_wait_avg_seconds.help: The average wait time for an item before it's serviced by the dispatcher

kv_ep_bg_wait_seconds.help: The total elapse time for the wait queue

kv_ep_blob_num.help: The number of blob objects in the cache

kv_ep_checkpoint_memory_bytes.help: Memory of items in all checkpoints

kv_ep_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.help: Mem of all checkpoints struct - from allocator
kv_ep_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.notes: Internal-only metric that will be removed in next minor release

kv_ep_checkpoint_memory_pending_destruct.help: Memory of checkpoint structures awaiting destruction by a background task

kv_ep_checkpoint_memory_quota_bytes.help: Max allocation allowed in all checkpoints

kv_ep_chk_persistence_remains.help: Number of remaining vbuckets for checkpoint persistence

kv_ep_commit_time_seconds.help: Number of milliseconds of most recent commit

kv_ep_cursors_dropped.help: Number of cursors dropped by the checkpoint remover

kv_ep_db_data_size_bytes.help: Total size of valid data in db files

kv_ep_db_file_size_bytes.help: Total size of the db files

kv_ep_db_prepare_size_bytes.help: Total size of SyncWrite prepares in db files

kv_ep_defragmenter_num_moved.help: Number of items moved by the defragmentater task.

kv_ep_defragmenter_num_visited.help: Number of items visited (considered for defragmentation) by the defragmenter task.

kv_ep_defragmenter_sleep_time_seconds.help: The amount of time the defragmenter task will sleep before it is scheduled to run again.

kv_ep_defragmenter_sv_num_moved.help: Number of StoredValues moved by the defragmentater task.

kv_ep_degraded_mode.help: True if the engine is either warming up or data traffic is disabled

kv_ep_diskqueue_drain.help: Total drained items on disk queue

kv_ep_diskqueue_fill.help: Total enqueued items on disk queue

kv_ep_diskqueue_memory_bytes.help: Total memory used in disk queue

kv_ep_expired_access.help: Number of times an item was expired on application access.

kv_ep_expired_compactor.help: Number of times an item was expired by the ep engine compactor

kv_ep_expired_pager.help: Number of times an item was expired by ep engine item pager

kv_ep_expiry_pager_task_time.help: Time of the next expiry pager task (GMT), NOT_SCHEDULED if expiry pager has been disabled

kv_ep_flusher_state.help: Current state of the flusher thread

kv_ep_flusher_todo.help: Number of items currently being written

kv_ep_ht_item_memory_bytes.help: The total byte size of all items, no matter the vbucket's state, no matter if an item's value is ejected. Tracks the same value as ep_total_cache_size

kv_ep_io_compaction_read_bytes_bytes.help: Total number of bytes read during compaction

kv_ep_io_compaction_write_bytes_bytes.help: Total number of bytes written during compaction

kv_ep_item_begin_failed.help: Number of times a transaction failed to start due to storage errors

kv_ep_item_commit_failed.help: Number of times a transaction failed to commit due to storage errors

kv_ep_item_compressor_num_compressed.help: Number of items compressed by the item compressor task.

kv_ep_item_compressor_num_visited.help: Number of items visited (considered for compression) by the item compressor task.

kv_ep_item_flush_expired.help: Number of times an item is not flushed due to the expiry of the item

kv_ep_item_flush_failed.help: Number of times an item failed to flush due to storage errors

kv_ep_item_num.help: The number of item objects allocated

kv_ep_items_expelled_from_checkpoints.help: Number of items expelled from checkpoints. Expelled refers to items that have been ejected from memory but are still considered to be part of the checkpoint.

kv_ep_items_rm_from_checkpoints.help: Number of items removed from closed unreferenced checkpoints

kv_ep_key_value_size_bytes.help: Memory used to store items metadata, keys and values in the system, no matter the vbucket's state.

kv_ep_magma_block_cache_hit_ratio_ratio.notes: Internal-only metric that will be removed in next minor release

kv_ep_magma_bytes_incoming_bytes.help: Data written to key, seq, local index as part of the KV frontend writes.

kv_ep_magma_compactions.help: Count of Magma compactions in key, seq and local index.

kv_ep_magma_write_bytes_bytes.help: Bytes written by Magma flushes, compactions and WAL writes.

kv_ep_magma_writeamp_ratio.help: Magma write amplification ratio (Data written by Data Service / Data written to disk)
kv_ep_magma_writeamp_ratio.notes: Internal-only metric that will be removed in next minor release

kv_ep_mem_freed_by_checkpoint_removal_by.help: Amount of memory freed through ckpt removal

kv_ep_mem_tracker_enabled.help: True if memory usage tracker is enabled

kv_ep_meta_data_disk_bytes.help: Total disk used by meta data

kv_ep_meta_data_memory_bytes.help: Total memory used by meta data

kv_ep_num_access_scanner_runs.help: Number of times we ran accesss scanner to snapshot working set

kv_ep_num_access_scanner_skips.help: Number of times accesss scanner task decided not to generate access log

kv_ep_num_checkpoints.help: The number of checkpoint objects allocated

kv_ep_num_eject_failures.help: Number of items that could not be ejected

kv_ep_num_expiry_pager_runs.help: Number of times we ran expiry pager loops to purge expired items from memory/disk

kv_ep_num_freq_decayer_runs.help: Number of times we ran the freq decayer task because a frequency counter has become saturated

kv_ep_num_not_my_vbuckets.help: Number of times Not My VBucket exception happened during runtime

kv_ep_num_pager_runs.help: Number of times we ran pager loops to seek additional memory

kv_ep_num_value_ejects.help: Number of times item values got ejected from memory to disk

kv_ep_num_workers.help: Global number of shared worker threads

kv_ep_oom_errors.help: Number of times unrecoverable OOMs happened while processing operations

kv_ep_pending_ops.help: Number of ops awaiting pending vbuckets

kv_ep_pending_ops_max.help: Max ops seen awaiting 1 pending vbucket

kv_ep_pending_ops_max_duration_seconds.help: Max time (µs) used waiting on pending vbuckets

kv_ep_pending_ops_total.help: Total blocked pending ops since reset

kv_ep_persist_vbstate_total.help: Total VB persist state to disk

kv_ep_queue_size.help: Number of items queued for storage

kv_ep_rocksdb_block_cache_data_hit_ratio.help: Cache hit ratio for Data blocks

kv_ep_rocksdb_block_cache_filter_hit_rat.help: Cache hit ratio for Filter blocks

kv_ep_rocksdb_block_cache_index_hit_rati.help: Cache hit ratio for Index blocks

kv_ep_rocksdb_default_kSizeAllMemTables_.help: Total MT size for default CFs

kv_ep_rocksdb_default_kTotalSstFilesSize.help: Total SST size for default CFs

kv_ep_rocksdb_seqno_kSizeAllMemTables_by.help: Total MT size for seqno CFs

kv_ep_rocksdb_seqno_kTotalSstFilesSize_b.help: Total SST size for seqno CFs

kv_ep_storedval_num.help: The number of storedval objects allocated

kv_ep_tmp_oom_errors.help: Number of times temporary OOMs happened while processing operations

kv_ep_total_cache_size_bytes.help: The total byte size of all items, no matter the vbucket's state, no matter if an item's value is ejected. Tracks the same value as ep_ht_item_memory

kv_ep_total_deduplicated.help: Total number of items de-duplicated when queued to CheckpointManager

kv_ep_total_deduplicated_flusher.help: Total number of items de-duplicated when flushed to disk

kv_ep_total_enqueued.help: Total number of items queued for persistence

kv_ep_total_new_items.help: Total number of persisted new items

kv_ep_uncommitted_items.help: The amount of items that have not been written to disk

kv_ep_vbucket_del_avg_walltime_seconds.help: Avg wall time (µs) spent by deleting a vbucket

kv_ep_vbucket_del_fail.help: Number of failed vbucket deletion events

kv_ep_vbucket_del_max_walltime_seconds.help: Max wall time (µs) spent by deleting a vbucket

kv_ep_warmup_access_log.help: Number of keys present in access log

kv_ep_warmup_estimated_key_count.help: Estimated number of keys in database

kv_ep_warmup_estimated_value_count.help: Estimated number of values in database

kv_ep_warmup_state.help: The current state of the warmup thread

kv_ep_warmup_status.help: The current status of the warmup thread

kv_ep_workload_pattern.help: Workload pattern (mixed, read_heavy, write_heavy) monitored at runtime

kv_magma_compactions.help: Count of Magma compactions in seq index.

kv_manifest_uid.help: The uid of the last manifest accepted from the cluster, only returned when all scopes are requested (no name or id provided)

kv_mem_used_estimate_bytes.help: Engine's total estimated memory usage This is a faster stat to read, but lags mem_used as it's only updated when a threshold is crossed see mem_used_merge_threshold

kv_memcache_curr_items.help: Number of active items in memory

kv_memory_overhead_bytes.help: The "unused" memory caused by the allocator returning bigger chunks than requested

kv_total_memory_overhead_bytes.help: Extra memory used by transient data like persistence queue, replication queues, checkpoints, etc

kv_vb_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.help: Number of bytes used for internal structures related to checkpoints, excluding user data
kv_vb_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.notes: Internal-only metric that will be removed in next minor release

kv_vb_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.help: Number of bytes used for internal structures related to checkpoints, excluding user data
kv_vb_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.notes: Internal-only metric that will be removed in next minor release

kv_vb_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.help: Number of bytes used for internal structures related to checkpoints, excluding user data
kv_vb_checkpoint_memory_overhead_allocat.notes: Internal-only metric that will be removed in next minor release
